akn:section.akn:heading: Charter or sale of vessels acquired by Department of Transportation

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 57504. Charter or sale of vessels acquired by Department of Transportation Vessels transferred to or otherwise acquired by the Department of Transportation in any manner may be chartered or sold by the Secretary of Transportation as provided in this chapter. (Pub. L. 109–304, § 8(c), Oct. 6, 2006, 120 Stat. 1665.)
